name: Visual Impairment
description:
Visual Impairment was made solo for "Mini Jam 65: Abandoned" in 72 hours - using Unity & Aseprite.

"" It is an Arcade style 2D game about a character with a big eye inside of a dungeon, the place is abandoned and the enemies are growing trees out of their heads. As you take damage your heart begins to race and you start losing vision in your one big eye. Your goal is to kill as many enemies as you can and try beat your high score - Sprint potions give you extra max and current sprint time. Can you make it out alive? ""

[=-=--=--=--=--=--=-=--=--=--=--=--=--=-=--=--=--=--=--=--=--=--=--=-=-=--=-=--=--=]

CONTROLS:

"WASD" = Move player.

Hold "Space" = Sprint (watch out for your sprint bar)

"Left Mouse Click" = Shoot. ( you can spam it if you like ;D)

"E" = Drink health potions.

"Escape" = Open pause menu while in game.

NOTE: MUSIC MAY BE LOUD ON LAUNCH && IF YOU HAVE WINDOWS I RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING INSTEAD OF PLAYING THE WEB VERSION

[=-=--=--=--=--=--=-=--=--=--=--=--=--=-=--=--=--=--=--=--=--=--=--=-=-=--=-=--=--=]

I'm 17 and this is my first game jam (hopefully of many) - I had to create all the art and scripts from scratch so some of it may seem a bit rushed since I had to dedicate time towards the important mechanics and couldn't polish it. All feedback welcomed and I hope you enjoy!
